trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Hayward
There were no other sightings in Hayward on or around October 15th 2007
Summary: Red Light moving back and forth.
divs: Sighting DetailsA light which I thought to be a plane moving back and forth from approx. Northwest to Southeast, I noticed it since it didnt look like an airplane as it was bright red. It went Northwest, and immediately reversed direction and went Southeast. I have seen it approx three times so far as it keeps repeating the pattern. It does not blink like an airplane, and airplanes cannot reverse direction as quickly as this thing has. Also it travels at a higher rate of speed than a plane.
